title: FINAL FANTASY XIII-2
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Spanish. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  The unfolding drama of FINAL FANTASY XIII, released in 2010 and selling six million copies worldwide, continues in FINAL FANTASY XIII-2. Explore a richly developed world featuring both new and familiar faces, and an exciting and highly developed strategic battle system.  In this ongoing saga, the future is about to change...

childDownloads.title: Serah's Weapon: Azrael
childDownloads.description: A new weapon for Serah. Named after the angel of souls, and said to hold the power to alter fate. Increases chain bonuses.  Obtainable from Chocolina's Shop. Improved versions of this weapon will also be available.

childDownloads.title: Serah's Outfit: White Mage
childDownloads.description: A new outfit for Serah, based on the white mage from the FINAL FANTASY series.  Select Outfits from the main menu to change clothing. New outfits will not be shown on characters during certain cutscenes and story sequences.

childDownloads.title: Noel's Outfit: Ezio Auditore
childDownloads.description: A new outfit for Noel, based on the costume worn by Ezio Auditore.  Select Outfits from the main menu to change clothing. New outfits will not be shown on characters during certain cutscenes and story sequences.  © 2011, 2012 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All rights reserved. Ezio Auditore Costume Design © 2011 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved.

childDownloads.title: Noel's Outfit: Spacetime Guardian
childDownloads.description: A new outfit for Noel. This garb is said to be a gift of the goddess to those who fight to correct the anomalies of time.  Select Outfits from the main menu to change clothing. New outfits will not be shown on characters during certain cutscenes and story sequences.

childDownloads.title: Serah's Outfit: N7 Armor
childDownloads.description: A new outfit for Serah, based on the armor worn by Commander Shepard of the SSV Normandy.  Select Outfits from the main menu to change clothing. New outfits will not be shown on characters during certain cutscenes and story sequences.  © 2011, 2012 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All rights reserved.  Costume Design © 2012 EA International (Studio and Publishing) Ltd.

childDownloads.title: Opponent: Ultros & Typhon
childDownloads.description: Face the creepy Ultros and his guardian Typhon in the Coliseum! Use the crystals of defeated foes to summon them as allies in battle.  The Coliseum appears in the Historia Crux (available from Chapter 2 onwards). To access this content, enter the Historia Crux and select "Coliseum -??? AF-".

childDownloads.title: Noel's Outfit: N7 Armor
childDownloads.description: A new outfit for Noel, based on the armor worn by Commander Shepard of the SSV Normandy.  Select Outfits from the main menu to change clothing. New outfits will not be shown on characters during certain cutscenes and story sequences.  © 2011, 2012 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All rights reserved.  Costume Design © 2012 EA International (Studio and Publishing) Ltd.

childDownloads.title: Serah's Outfit: Beachwear
childDownloads.description: A new outfit for Serah. The perfect costume for soaking up the sun and hanging out with friends on the shores of New Bodhum.  Select Outfits from the main menu to change clothing. New outfits will not be shown on characters during certain cutscenes and story sequences.

childDownloads.title: FINAL FANTASY® XIII-2 DLC Bundle Pack
childDownloads.description: Purchase all FINAL FANTASY XIII-2 Add-ons for a discounted price. *Please note the following Add-ons are not included in the bundle.  FINAL FANTASY® XIII-2 Noel’s Outfit: N7 Armor, FINAL FANTASY® XIII-2 Serah’s Outfit: N7 Armor, FINAL FANTASY® XIII-2 Noel's Outfit: Ezio Auditore, FINAL FANTASY® XIII-2 Serah’s Outfit: Style and Steel, FINAL FANTASY® XIII-2 Serah's Weapon: Seraphic Wing, FINAL FANTASY® XIII-2 Serah's Weapon: Azrael

childDownloads.title: Sazh: Heads or Tails?
childDownloads.description: Unlock new casino content and a new episode featuring Sazh in Serendipity. Complete the episode to gain Sazh as a battle ally.  To access this content, enter the Historia Crux (available from Chapter 2 onwards) and select "Serendipity -??? AF-".

childDownloads.title: Noel's Weapon: Catastrophe Blade
childDownloads.description: A new weapon for Noel. Nomads used these powerful swords to unleash a rapid flurry of blows. Increases ATB gauge recharge rate.  Obtainable from Chocolina's Shop. Improved versions of this weapon will also be available.

childDownloads.title: Opponent: Gilgamesh
childDownloads.description: Face the void-traveller Gilgamesh in the Coliseum! Use the crystals of defeated foes to summon them as allies in battle.  The Coliseum appears in the Historia Crux (available from Chapter 2 onwards). To access this content, enter the Historia Crux and select "Coliseum -??? AF-".

childDownloads.title: FFXIII-2 Gamer Pictures
childDownloads.description: A set of 5 gamer pictures featuring popular FINAL FANTASY XIII-2 characters.

childDownloads.title: Mog's Outfits: A Wondrous Wardrobe
childDownloads.description: A collection of new outfits for Mog, complete with 16 different costumes.  Select Outfits from the main menu to change clothing. New outfits will not be shown on characters during certain cutscenes and story sequences.

childDownloads.title: Serah's Weapon: Genji Bow
childDownloads.description: A new weapon for Serah. A weapon symbolizing the honor of a distinguished line of warriors. Increases ATB gauge recharge rate.  Obtainable from Chocolina's Shop. Improved versions of this weapon will also be available.  This item can also be downloaded by redeeming the corresponding promotion code. The promotion code will no longer be valid once the item is purchased.

childDownloads.title: Opponent: Nabaat
childDownloads.description: Face PSICOM officer Jihl Nabaat in the Coliseum! Use the crystals of defeated foes to summon them as allies in battle.  The Coliseum appears in the Historia Crux (available from Chapter 2 onwards). To access this content, enter the Historia Crux and select "Coliseum -??? AF-".

childDownloads.title: Opponent: Lightning & Amodar
childDownloads.description: Face Lightning and Lieutenant Amodar in the Coliseum! Use the crystals of defeated foes to summon them as allies in battle.  The Coliseum appears in the Historia Crux (available from Chapter 2 onwards). To access this content, enter the Historia Crux and select "Coliseum-??? AF-".

childDownloads.title: Serah's Outfit: Style and Steel
childDownloads.description: A new outfit for Serah. This costume, designed by popular Japanese idol group member Yuko Oshima, was chosen by fan vote.  Select Outfits from the main menu to change clothing. New outfits will not be shown on characters during certain cutscenes and story sequences.

childDownloads.title: Serah's Outfit: Summoner's Garb
childDownloads.description: A new outfit for Serah. Wear the traditional garb of the distant summoner whose soul is bound to Serah's across time and space.  Select Outfits from the main menu to change clothing. New outfits will not be shown on characters during certain cutscenes and story sequences.  This item can also be downloaded by redeeming the corresponding promotion code. The promotion code will no longer be valid once the item is purchased.

childDownloads.title: Noel's Outfit: Battle Attire
childDownloads.description: A new outfit for Noel. This gold and crimson battle attire is crafted from durable leather, and worn only by chosen warriors.  Select Outfits from the main menu to change clothing. New outfits will not be shown on characters during certain cutscenes and story sequences.

childDownloads.title: Noel's Weapon: Muramasa
childDownloads.description: A new weapon for Noel. A weapon of fey power feared as the blade that will strike down time's master. Increases chain bonuses.  Obtainable from Chocolina's Shop. Improved versions of this weapon will also be available.

childDownloads.title: Lightning: Requiem of the Goddess
childDownloads.description: This downloadable content features FINAL FANTASY XIII-2 spoilers.  Completing the main game is recommended before playing.  Get ready for a new episode in Valhalla! Complete Lightning's exciting story under certain conditions to unlock the fierce warrior cloaked in divine armor as a party member!  To access this content, enter the Historia Crux (available from Chapter 2 onwards) and select "Valhalla -??? AF-".

childDownloads.title: FINAL FANTASY XIII-2 Demo
childDownloads.description: The unfolding drama of FINAL FANTASY XIII, released in 2010 and selling six million copies worldwide, continues in FINAL FANTASY XIII-2. Explore a richly developed world featuring both new and familiar faces, and an exciting and highly developed strategic battle system.  In this ongoing saga, the future is about to change...

To access this content, enter the Historia Crux (available from Chapter 2 onwards) and select "Coliseum -??? AF-".

childDownloads.title: Noel's Outfit: Black Mage
childDownloads.description: A new outfit for Noel, based on the black mage from the FINAL FANTASY series.  Select Outfits from the main menu to change clothing. New outfits will not be shown on characters during certain cutscenes and story sequences.

childDownloads.title: Serah's Weapon: Seraphic Wing
childDownloads.description: A new weapon for Serah. Designed with an angel wing motif, this bow restores the wielder's HP as it damages an enemy.  Obtainable from Chocolina's Shop. Improved versions of this weapon will also be available.

childDownloads.title: FINAL FANTASY XIII-2 - Teaser Trailer
childDownloads.description: FINAL FANTASY XIII-2, the sequel to the worldwide hit FINAL FANTASY XIII, is set for release next winter! Take a peek at the teaser trailer revealed on January 18. More details coming soon!
